# TS Todo Project
This is a simple TypeScript project for managing tasks.

## Usage
- `node dist/cli.js add <title> --data <path>`: Add a new task.
- `node dist/cli.js list --data <path>`: List all tasks.
- `node dist/cli.js done <id> --data <path>`: Mark a task as done.
- `node dist/cli.js remove <id> --data <path>`: Remove a task.

notes: Added src/cli.ts and updated README.md with basic usage instructions.
